ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa turned to Liono. And you call yourself leader. Plintissa turns to Stranato. And YOU! Give Arrow a chance! He makes one mistake and you hate him!

Received: from birdboy (TAMPA020-0340.splitrock.net [63.254.83.86]) by pimout2-int.prodigy.net (8.8.5/8.8.5) with SMTP id RAA23140 for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Wed, 21 Jun 2000 17:58:31 -0400

To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
Date: Wed, 21 Jun 2000 17:54:51 -0400
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 5.00.2919.6600
X-Mimeole: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.2919.6600
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Plintissa turned to Liono.

"And you call yourself leader." Plintissa turns to Stranato.

"And YOU! Give Arrow a chance! He makes one mistake and you hate him! Your
almost as bad as Liono in that factor!" Stranato just glared at Plintissa
while she talked.

"It is my group and we do not have to stick around in your little group, so
watch what you say." Stranato whispered loudly.

"Arrow screwed up, and the Radicons must be perfection." Train Wreck said.

"Arrow will not be missed, we lost many Radicons before, but always got
replacements." Airbomber said.

"Hey, Scamrock, pass me another beer." Stronghold said. Scamrock put down
his long enough to hand Stronghold one. Stranato snapped.

"That's it! You bums do nothing but laze around and drink beer, and play
cards, and smoke cigars, well I'm through with you 2 as well! You can be
replaced!" Stranato yelled. Stronghold and Scamrock nodded to each other and
walked away. Train Wreck and Airbomber are a bit worrried now, it's just
them and Stranato now, Stranato ran the others off.

"Let's reconfigure out systems for a 3 robots gestalt conversion." Stranato
said. The others nodded and folowed him. Artist suddenly started laughing
madly at the fat that the People's Group was just composed of himself,
Dracona, 3 Radicons, and himself, and with Stranato's needs, he didn't know
how long that would last. Dracona stepped back outside and surveyed
everyones damage. Plintissa searched for Iron Raptor, calling out Iron
Raptor's name...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2000 7:10 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG



* Iron Raptor sighed as she felt Prowl tightens his hold on her, it was
hopeless to try and speak any sense into the rest of the Maximals but she
still wanted to try. But then her attention was averted back towards Prowl
as she felt a little excitement in his body as he held her, and she knew
that when 100 feet up in the air that could be very dangerous!
She could feel that he was enjoying holding her but this was hardly the time
or place, she just hoped that this little fact wouldn't distract him to the
point of taking his mind off of the battle where it should be.not the feel
of her curves under his hand's touch.
But then she suddenly heard something coming towards them and she dearly
hoped that it wasn't a tree like last time, when turning her head and looked
she then wished that it WAS a tree!
She saw the laser hit and cut through Prowl's wing and grimaced when they
went into a spiral, now she knew why she hated flying!
Her stomach felt like it was in her throat as she then realized that they
were in a glide, her hands and legs clinging to Prowl as she pressed her
body to him. She slowly opened her optics but still clung, fearing that they
might have been scrap by now or have hit hard.but then hadn't.
Iron Raptor then looked up at Prowl as they lost altitude; she was damaged
enough without having to crash!
Thanx to the fact that he couldn't keep his mind on the battle when she was
near him. She was flattered but also a bit pissed off; this wasn't the first
time that his wondering mind had caused trouble.
She sighed with a bit of annoyance but also a bit of expectance, she knew
that he loved her but this was just ridicules. *

" Keep your mind on the battle and not on me for a change, Feather Head!"

* Her tone was that of a bit of amusement and annoyance mixed, there was no
harsh tinge to her voice at all as she then looked back into the optics of
Prowl. But then shook her head, she knew that their landing wouldn't be the
best in the world but she hoped that it wouldn't be too rough that he fell
over, she was damaged and so was he.they didn't need further damage.
Iron Raptor then looked past Prowl's optics and at the hole in his wing in
which was the cause of them slowly losing altitude, if only there was a way
to patch it fast enough that they could regain their height and get to
safety. She growled, but there wasn't a way to patch it! Not here so high
but when she looked over her shoulder she then gasped.they weren't so high
anymore!
Iron Raptor looked around for the position of Oblitertron as she then heard
the ground rush up, her own legs ready to absorb the impact for Prowl's
damaged leg. The Alliance mightmare wasn't too far off but just far enough
away for them to be out of it's firing range.
The landing wasn't too bad but it was bad enough that it caused Iron Raptor
to land on her back and then flip onto her damaged side, a yip of pain heard
as a sharp rock dug into her side.
With a rather pained groan she then rose to her feet but then walked over to
Prowl, wondering if he was all right and not knowing how the fall had
damaged him. With a gentle hand she then reached out to him, concern in her
optics but also the panicked need to get him to a CR chamber but a bit
relaxed that the Alliance enemy had now split up and was less of a threat. *
